Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Avinoleum
Description: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Avinoleum to her.
QuestDesc: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Avinoleum to her.

Conditions.PreQuestName: The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looks like these pages are from an Acolyte's memoir. She used to serve at the Titular Repository in Avinoleum.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Avinoleum... That was the name of the old Seminary in Ragunna, wasn't it? Once a place of great renown.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, it's been a long time since its heyday. This book tells about her life there. Nothing too dramatic.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Still, even if it's just the small, day-to-day stuff, they clearly meant a lot to her. She wrote down how she felt at the time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As I read through it, I can feel it... the warmth she carried, and the light she wanted to pass on.
